Question.Subject: Should I trust Cashle.com?
Question.Content: Should I trust it enough to give out my personal information? does anybody else use this site with success? Do you get a lot of junk mail or spam because of this website? Do you get junk mail from this site?
Question.ChosenAnswer:
actuallu ive used it and you can trust them but.... ya i did get quite a bit of spam. but then again i have yahoo and it doesnt block it :/ maybe your email would :p
(:

Answer.Content:
actuallu ive used it and you can trust them but.... ya i did get quite a bit of spam. but then again i have yahoo and it doesnt block it :/ maybe your email would :p
